abilities.name: Evolutionary Fan
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you play Shiftry from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may choose 1 of your Evolved Pokémon in play (excluding any Shiftry). Return that Pokémon and all cards attached to it to your hand.

attacks.name: Reactive Beating
attacks.effect: If Shiftry has any React Energy cards attached to it, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Cross-Cut
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is an Evolved Pokémon, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.
